hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DATASET_ROOT_DIR_ON_QAF01
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The main directory where is the dataset on qaf01

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DATASET_LOCAL_DIR_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The local directory name under mnt/data/datasets/

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_LOCAL_DIR_NAME}/data mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_LOCAL_DIR_NAME}/sql-dump mkdir -p /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_LOCAL_DIR_NAME}/ldap rsync --progress -av jenkinsa@qaf01.exoplatform.org:${DATASET_ROOT_DIR_ON_QAF01}/data/*.rar /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_LOCAL_DIR_NAME}/data/ rsync --progress -av jenkinsa@qaf01.exoplatform.org:${DATASET_ROOT_DIR_ON_QAF01}/sql-dump/*.rar /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_LOCAL_DIR_NAME}/sql-dump/ rsync --progress -av jenkinsa@qaf01.exoplatform.org:${DATASET_ROOT_DIR_ON_QAF01}/ldap/*.gz /mnt/data/datasets/${DATASET_LOCAL_DIR_NAME}/ldap/
